View on Discogs

Tracklist

  1. Smack My Bitch Up (Noisia Remix) (5:53)
  2. Firestarter (Alvin Risk Remix) (3:18)
  3. Breathe (Zeds Dead Remix) (4:36)
  4. Smack My Bitch Up (Major Lazer Remix)
    Watch video
    (5:05)

Notes

Contains new remixes by Major Lazer, Noisia, Zeds Dead and Alvin Risk. Smack My Bitch Up: Published by EMI Virgin Music Ltd/Next Plateau Music Inc/Beats G Music. Firestarter: Published by EMI Virgin Music Ltd/MCA Music/Perfect Songs/Zomba Music. Breathe: Published by EMI Virgin Music Ltd/EMI Music Ltd/MCA Music. All tracks produced and mixed at Earthbound. Vocals recorded at Strongroom. Smack My Bitch Up contains portions of "Give The Drummer Some" by Ultramagnetic M.C.'s from their album entitled "Critical Beatdown" used courtesy of Next Plateau Records. Firestarter contains a sample "SOS" courtesy of 4AD/Elektra (by arrangement with Warner Special Products); "Close To The Edit" by Art Of Noise under license from ZTT Records Ltd. Smack My Bitch Up (Noisia Remix): Remix and additional production at De Noisia Kantoor II, Groningen, Holland. Special thanks to Jim Pavloff. Original versions of Smack My Bitch Up, Firestarter and Breathe are available on The Fat Of The Land Expanded Edition (Catalogue number: XLCD586). Made in England. ℗ 2012 XL Recordings Ltd. © 2012 XL Recordings Ltd.
